actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the employee benefit plan nondiscrimination rules added by the Tax Reform Act of 1986.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that establish nondiscrimination requirements for coverage and benefits under certain statutory employee benefit plans. (The consequence is the repeal of section 89 of the Internal Revenue Code.)

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the employee benefit plan nondiscrimination rules added by the Tax Reform Act of 1986.
